title: Exploring Quarantine Breach Rates with the DeltaQ Shiny App
text: deltaq package provides access simulated 7-day quarantine breach rate data Australia states territories, covering 27 October 2020 â€“ 31 July 2021. included DeltaQ: Breach Data Explorer Shiny app offers intuitive visualisation breach rates across jurisdictions. enables : Compare breach rate trends states territories side--side. Select combination states focused comparison. Filter date range 27 October 2020 31 July 2021 zoom specific periods. makes easy see jurisdictions susceptible breaches.

title: Exploring Quarantine Breach Rates with the DeltaQ Shiny App
text: app packaged deltaq can launched directly: Launch Shiny app (interactive) deltaq::launch_app() Use controls pick multiple jurisdictions narrow date window. main panel shows daily breach-rate time series; short guide plot summarises state changed.

title: Exploring Quarantine Breach Rates with the DeltaQ Shiny App
text: app uses deltaq::breach, REPORT_DATE plus one numeric column per jurisdiction (breach rate per day). library(deltaq) data(â€œbreachâ€) str(breach)

title: Exploring Simulated Quarantine Breach Data with deltaq
text: deltaq package provides access 7-day quarantine breach rate data (Zachreson et al. 2022) simulated Australia states/territories, covering 27 Oct 2020 â€“ 31 Jul 2021.

title: Exploring Simulated Quarantine Breach Data with deltaq
text: DeltaQ: Breach Data Explorer app provides interactive dashboard exploring 7-day quarantine breach rates across Australian jurisdictions. app automatically updates visualisations inputs change, allowing real-time comparison jurisdictions trends. launched directly R using: deltaq::launch_app() opens Shiny interface locally web browser.

title: Breach Data â€” breach
text: Simulated 7-day quarantine breach rate data across Australian states territories, based modelling Zachreson et al. (2022).

title: Breach Data â€” breach
Breach Data â€” breach
text: tibble one row per date following columns: REPORT_DATE Date observation (class: Date) AUS, NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, WA, TAS, NT, ACT Daily 7-day breach rates jurisdiction AUS_BREACH, NSW_BREACH, VIC_BREACH, QLD_BREACH, SA_BREACH, WA_BREACH, TAS_BREACH, NT_BREACH, ACT_BREACH Binary indicators (1 = breach event occurred, 0 = none)

title: Breach Data â€” breach
text: Simulated data derived Zachreson et al. (2022), COVID-19 low-tolerance border quarantine systems: Impact Delta variant SARS-CoV-2. Science Advances. Available https://www.science.org/doi/10.1126/sciadv.abm3624.

title: Breach Data â€” breach
text: dataset includes raw simulated data showing 7-day breach rates COVID-19 (potential viruses) within Australian quarantine systems. provides state-level national-level daily observations breach probabilities different quarantine system configurations. data extracted sheet 9 data-raw/covid.xlsx, derived simulations presented Zachreson et al. (2022). original study available https://www.science.org/doi/10.1126/sciadv.abm3624. dataset can used analyse susceptibility virus given quarantine systems implemented across different Australian jurisdictions.
